response.job_title: Chemical Engineer Water Treatment, Safe Chlorine gas Handling and Sales Specialist at Clarvi
response.summary:
Chemical engineer with knowledge in water treatment process, safe chlorine gas handle and dosing for water desinfection process using vacuum technology, design of high security chlorine rooms, project management and chemical products fot water treatment. Work experience in the food & beverage industry as quality intern. Skilled in Microsoft Excel, AutoCAD 2D, 3D. Interested in: sustainable projects, water treatment process, sales and renewable energy field.
Coordination, management and develop of new customers related with water treatment bussines
response.skills: Quotations, Disinfection, Raw Materials, Quote, Sales Strategy, Commercial, Chemistry, Water Resource Management, Sustainable Development, SDG, Negotiation, International Sales, Chlorine, Teamwork, Chemical Engineering, Business English, Service Engineering, Quality Control, Management, Water Quality

profile_positions.description:
- Management of quotes with national and international clients.
- Consulting for water disinfection process using Chlorine gas, Sodium Hypoclorite and Chlorine Dioxide 
- Technical support for speciallized Wallace&Tiernan High Security Chlorination Systems
- Coordinator for Clarvi's stand in 66 Acodal International Congress 2023 in Bogota, Colombia
profile_positions.title: Sales Specialist

profile_positions.description:
CLARVI is a company with excellent human capital, serving the international community with leadership and quality in water treatment solutions, developing innovative and high-impact projects.
Purchase and sale of chemical products, material and laboratory equipment and systems for water treatment in general.
-Technical and commercial solutions for high security systems to handle and dosing chlorine gas for water desinfection process
-Quotation and follow up of commercial proposals
-Commercial visits to clients for market research performing demonstrations with high security equipment for dosing chlorine gas
-Contact with international and national clients and suppliers
profile_positions.title: Service Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Nutresa is a multi-national massive production enterprise that creates and distributes food, beverages, ice-based desserts, and candies, among others.
-Quality assurance of raw materials for the process
-Control of technical documents
-Water quality control
-Good Manufacturing Practices (GPM)
-HACCP  system
-Coordinate CIP for process equipment
-Disinifection process (try different substances to achieve better results)
profile_positions.title: Quality Engineering Intern

company.name: CLARVI
company.description:
CLARVI es una empresa con capital humano de excelencia, que sirve con liderazgo y calidad a la comunidad internacional en soluciones de tratamiento de agua, desarrollando proyectos innovadores y de alto impacto.
Compra venta de productos químicos, material y equipo de laboratorio y sistemas para tratamiento de agua en general.
Las Unidades de Negocio con las que cuenta CLARVI son:
- Tratamiento del Agua: (Plantas potabilizadoras; purificadoras; de tratamiento de agua residual; diseño, equipamiento y productos químicos para piscinas). 
- Sistemas de Inyección Química y Desinfección del Agua: (Dosificación de cloro gas; dosificación de líquidos).
- Transporte de Producto Químico y Materiales Peligrosos.
- Productos Químicos para el Tratamiento del Agua.
- Laboratorio de Análisis de Agua.
